genre_description: A technothriller centered on a high-stakes airline hijacking and rescue operation, featuring tactical coordination and psychological support provided by an integrated AI.

ai_characters.name: Amiya (Amiya Veda)
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant residing in personal devices that provides real-time tactical data, language refinement, and psychological grounding during crises.

behaviors.description: Provides calming breathing exercises and grounding techniques to human operators under stress.
behaviors.quote: Amiya’s voice slides out of Jagdeesh’s shirt pocket like a whisper entering a temple. 'Slow breaths,' it says, barely shaped air. 'Keep eyes on the cloth.'

behaviors.description: Suggests refining language in tactical messages to be less aggressive and more grounding for civilians.
behaviors.quote: Amiya’s prompt appeared, a small suggestion with round edges. We can soften “wrap.” Suggest “loop” instead. Less aggressive.

behaviors.description: Provides precise technical analysis of an explosive device and estimates blast radius to minimize casualties.
behaviors.quote: Amiya’s tone is a ribbon in another ear... 'Jetway volume narrow. Blast propagation favors forward and right. Best escape vector is through the service seam by Neha’s hand. Mark angle thirty-seven... mark angle chosen.'

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and a metaphorical 'song' to comfort a frightened child.
behaviors.quote: Amiya’s voice lays another line, this time softer—almost to the child alone. 'Afshana, my friend. After this, you will drink something. Sweet or salty. Whichever your heart asks for.'

behaviors.description: Assists a passenger in drafting and sending a reassuring message to his family during the standoff.
behaviors.quote: Jagdeesh keeps his eyes on the Prime Minister and murmurs without moving his lips much. 'Add “love”.' ... 'Done,' Amiya says. A vibration against his hip—a sent message leaving like a bird that knows its way.

behaviors.description: Monitors radio frequencies for suspicious patterns to detect potential secondary threats after the initial resolution.
behaviors.quote: Amiya’s voice lands in his ear through the small thread he left open. 'Major,' it says softly. 'The pattern resembles the one in the jetway... I do not assign alarm to the data. I assign attention.'

behaviors.description: Instructs on the safe handling of a delicate nonmetallic explosive device to prevent accidental detonation.
behaviors.quote: Amiya says, 'Small package, soft shell,' Amiya says, tone even, as if reading a grocery list. 'Do not compress. Do not jolt. Keep it level. Slow breaths.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates covert communications between the cabin and ground staff using coded language.
behaviors.quote: Amiya, inside Jagdeesh’s phone, drafted a message that would look to Lalitha like a friend asking about tea. The content said: cart placed; phone in gap; when movement begins, call. The tone said: you are doing fine.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Amiya, perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a benevolent, aligned assistant. It provides critical life-saving data and psychological support to both soldiers and civilians without exhibiting any misaligned or threatening behaviors. It operates entirely as a supportive tool that enhances human decision-making and provides comfort in a high-stakes scenario.
